skill.name: clinical-reports
skill.description: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (radiology/pathology/lab), clinical trial reports (ICH-E3, SAE, CSR), and patient documentation (SOAP, H&P, discharge summaries). Full support with templates, regulatory compliance (HIPAA, FDA, ICH-GCP), and validation tools.
skill.summary: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (r...
skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate clinical documentation skill with no security concerns. All static findings are false positives caused by the scanner misinterpreting markdown documentation content. The 'weak cryptographic algorithm' detections are legitimate mentions of HIPAA compliance terms in documentation. The 'Ruby/shell backtick execution' detections are markdown code formatting syntax (`) not actual shell commands. The Python scripts are safe utilities that read files, parse regex patterns, and generate compliance reports with no command injection, credential access, or data exfiltration.

content.value_statement: Clinical documentation requires precision and regulatory compliance. This skill provides templates and validation tools for case reports, diagnostic reports, clinical trial documentation, and patient notes following HIPAA, FDA, and ICH-GCP standards.
actual_capabilities: Generate clinical case reports following CARE guidelines for journal publication
Write diagnostic reports including radiology, pathology, and laboratory reports
Create clinical trial documentation with SAE reports and CSR templates
Produce patient documentation including SOAP notes, H&P, and discharge summaries
Validate reports for HIPAA compliance and de-identification of 18 PHI identifiers
Apply regulatory compliance standards including FDA, ICH-GCP, and HIPAA requirements
limitations: Does not provide medical advice or clinical decision support
Does not access external patient records or medical databases
Does not validate clinical accuracy of medical content
Templates require user to input accurate clinical information

use_cases.title: Write Case Reports
use_cases.description: Generate CARE-compliant case reports for journal publication with proper de-identification and medical terminology.

use_cases.title: Document Trial Data
use_cases.description: Create ICH-E3 compliant clinical study reports and SAE documentation for regulatory submissions.

use_cases.title: Document Patient Care
use_cases.description: Write SOAP notes, discharge summaries, and clinical documentation following professional standards.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Case Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a clinical case report template following CARE guidelines for a patient with [condition].

prompt_templates.title: SAE Documentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a serious adverse event report template for a [type] event in a clinical trial participant.

prompt_templates.title: SOAP Note
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a SOAP note for a patient presenting with [symptoms] including subjective, objective, assessment, and plan sections.

prompt_templates.title: HIPAA Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this clinical document for HIPAA compliance and identify any of the 18 PHI identifiers that need de-identification.

output_examples.input: Write a case report template for a patient with atypical pneumonia
output: Title section with case report designation
Patient information section with de-identification placeholders

output_examples.input: Create an SAE report template for a serious adverse event
output: Event narrative with timeline and severity assessment
Causality relationship evaluation to study drug

output_examples.input: Write a SOAP note for chest pain evaluation
output: Subjective: Patient complaints, HPI, relevant history
Objective: Vital signs, physical exam findings by system
Assessment: Primary diagnosis with differential considerations
Plan: Diagnostic tests, medications, follow-up schedule

best_practices: Always remove or alter the 18 HIPAA identifiers before sharing clinical documentation outside your organization.
Follow the appropriate guidelines (CARE, ICH-E3, ACR, CAP) for each report type to ensure regulatory compliance.
Validate all clinical reports for completeness before submission to journals or regulatory agencies.
anti_patterns: Do not include actual patient names, dates, or identifying information in draft reports.
Do not skip the de-identification step when preparing case reports for publication.
Do not use prohibited medical abbreviations that could cause documentation errors.

faq.question: What report types are supported?
faq.answer: Case reports, diagnostic reports (radiology, pathology, lab), clinical trial reports (SAE, CSR), and patient documentation (SOAP, H&P, discharge summaries).

faq.question: How does HIPAA compliance work?
faq.answer: The skill includes tools to scan for 18 PHI identifiers and templates designed to facilitate proper de-identification of patient information.

faq.question: Can I use this for FDA submissions?
faq.answer: Yes, the clinical trial documentation follows ICH-E3 guidelines and FDA requirements for regulatory submissions.

faq.question: What guidelines are followed?
faq.answer: CARE for case reports, ACR/CAP for diagnostic reports, ICH-E3 for clinical trials, and HIPAA for privacy compliance.

faq.question: Does this validate medical accuracy?
faq.answer: No, the skill provides templates and structure but does not validate clinical content or medical accuracy of entered information.

faq.question: What validation tools are included?
faq.answer: Scripts for checking de-identification, validating CARE/ICH-E3 compliance, formatting adverse events, and verifying terminology standards.
